snippet: Simon Cho, the reigning national short-track champion in speedskating, faces a hearing after confessing that he tampered with a Canadian rival’s skate at the 2011 World Team Championship.
abstract: Simon Cho, reigning United States national short-track champion in speedskating, faces a hearing after confessing that he tampered with a Canadian rival’s skate at the 2011 World Team Championship.
lead_paragraph: Simon Cho, the reigning national short-track champion in speedskating, faces a hearing after confessing that he tampered with a Canadian rival’s skate at the 2011 World Team Championship.

headline.seo: Skater Cho Faces Hearing After Tampering
